data.title: 1 Kitchen
images: https://cdn.bfldr.com/TU9NUD0C/at//6ppgtr6vgwjm4wcqghjntvn/1 Kitchen Wordmark NEW DRAFT - 1 Kitchen Final - v10.png
data.meta_description: A downtown Nashville restaurant led by nature, 1 Kitchen serves fresh, local, and sustainably sourced farm-to-table cuisine.
data.text:
Follow us on Instagram @1kitchennashville

Helmed by Culinary Director Chris Crary, 1 Kitchen Nashville serves up fresh, local, and sustainably sourced farm-to-table cuisine.

Located on the ground floor.

Dining Room | Mon - Thurs

Breakfast | 7am - 11am

Lunch | 11am - 2pm

Dinner | 5pm - 9pm

Dining Room | Fri - Sun

Vinyl Brunch | 7am - 2pm

Dinner | 5pm - 10pm

1 Kitchen Lounge

Sun - Thurs | 11am - 10pm

Fri & Sat | 11am - 11pm

Culinary Director Chris Crary

Meet our Culinary Director, Chris Crary. Chris focuses on creating menus that are collaborative and creative, reflecting a sustainably-driven cuisine that holds ingredients to the highest standard to create simple, healthy dishes that celebrate Nashville’s flavor and heritage.

Learn More

Meet Our Local Purveyors

Supporting local farmers and growers is essential to our sustainability efforts. Our purveyors provide us with the freshest, ethically sourced ingredients to ensure a mindful dining experience.

Garden-to-Table Produce

Using local Tennessee purveyors guarantees the freshest ingredients for our seasonal menu items.

Bloomsbury Farm

Greener Roots Farms

Rocky Glade Farm

S.E. Daugherty & Sons Farm

Bakers Garden

Responsibly Sourced

We work to ensure our meat, seafood and poultry are sourced ethically and sustainably, ensuring the best products with minimal environmental footprint.

Bucksnort Trout Ranch

Pig & Leaf Farms

Bear Creek Farm

Guest Love

Disclaimers

Food Disclaimer

* consuming raw or under cooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, eggs, or unpasteurized milk may increase your risk of food-borne illness. please alert your server of any allergies.

Liquor Tax Disclaimer

all prices are exclusive of a 15% alcohol tax + state and county tax.

Service Charge Disclaimer

for parties of 6 or more, a mandatory service charge equal to 18% of the total food and beverage will be added to your bill and will be distributed in full to hotel service employees who performed service in connection with your dining experience.
